text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلۡكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: Imana Allah, Izobagumiriza akabanga ku vyaha vyanyu, Ivyirengagize ntibibahanire, Iheze Ibinjize no mu mirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru, musi y’ibiti n’inyubakwa vyabwo hatemba inzuzi, harimwo n’imihana iteye igomwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”. Iyo rero, ni yo ntsinzi ihambaye.
